```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
setwd("/cloud/project/Unit 5")
```

```{r}
cleanit <- function() 
{
return(NameWeights %>% mutate (TotalPounds = as.numeric(str_extract(as.character(weight),"^[:digit:]+"))) %>% select(-weight))
}
```

## Read in the data
```{r}
NameWeights = read.csv('REGEXWeightChallenge.csv')
```

```{r}
result = NameWeights %>% 
  mutate (TotalPounds = as.numeric(str_extract(as.character(weight),"^[:digit:]+"))) %>%
  select(-weight)
```

```{r}
foo <- cleanit()
```
